reviews.content:
iPhone X, 13.3. 

Works, but breaks copying and pasting functionality. If you haven’t copied something in a while, the first time you do it, it will not let you paste it - it’ll show up in Pasithea’s log but the paste button will not appear. Annoying!

you have to paste twice just to paste & it plays the sound effect on every action like screenshot or clicking a link or just taking your screen, repeatedly after that for the next 2-3 actions. why is this paid with seemingly little to no support?

CrashReporter:
The main reason (PasitheaSettings)
Other causes(libmryipc.dylib)
